content: amigurumi crochet pattern for spring or easter bunny and eggs this pattern has been designed and created using red heart supersaver yarn aran/medium weight using a thicker yarn and larger hook compared to usual amigurumi projects these are still quite small but make up quickly they are beginner friendly the pattern does include a colour change but could easily be made in one colour it uses the magic_ring technique single_crochet and basic increases and decreases 2 stitches together decrease and 2 stitches into the same stitch to increase pastel colours have been used which i had in a craft pack of this brand of yarn the pattern is available as a pdf and includes full written instructions with images pattern at www cooldenim co uk makes a nice display or spring/easter gifts uses small amounts of yarn between 0-40g
